docs.text: Welcome Welcome to the Utility Pause Menu script documentation. Discord
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Welcome to the Utility Pause Menu script documentation.
docs.title: Welcome

docs.text: GetCurrentPauseMenu Return the current pause menu that is being displayed. Returns Data Type Description string "map", "settings", "pause" Example local menu = exports["utility_weapons"]:GetCurrentPauseMenu()
docs.title: GetCurrentPauseMenu

docs.text: Return the current pause menu that is being displayed. Returns Data Type Description string "map", "settings", "pause" Example local menu = exports["utility_weapons"]:GetCurrentPauseMenu()
docs.title: GetCurrentPauseMenu

docs.text: IsInPause return true if the pause menu its showing Returns Data Type Description boolean Example local inpause = exports["utility_weapons"]:IsInPause()
docs.title: IsInPause

docs.text: return true if the pause menu its showing Returns Data Type Description boolean Example local inpause = exports["utility_weapons"]:IsInPause()
docs.title: IsInPause

docs.text: OpenBrowserPage Open a browser page, with the given URL. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description url string - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:OpenBrowserPage("https://google.com")
docs.title: OpenBrowserPage

docs.text: Open a browser page, with the given URL. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description url string - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:OpenBrowserPage("https://google.com")
docs.title: OpenBrowserPage

docs.text: SetMapMenu Set the map menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "MAP" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetMapMenu(true) -- Open the map
docs.title: SetMapMenu

docs.text: Set the map menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "MAP" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetMapMenu(true) -- Open the map
docs.title: SetMapMenu

docs.text: SetPauseMenu Set the pause menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click ESC. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetPauseMenu(true) -- Open the pause menu
docs.title: SetPauseMenu

docs.text: Set the pause menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click ESC. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetPauseMenu(true) -- Open the pause menu
docs.title: SetPauseMenu

docs.text: SetSettingsMenu Set the settings menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "SETTINGS" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetSettingsMenu(true) -- Open the settings menu
docs.title: SetSettingsMenu

docs.text: Set the settings menu to be displayed, this is the menu that is displayed when you click the "SETTINGS" button. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:SetSettingsMenu(true) -- Open the settings menu
docs.title: SetSettingsMenu

docs.text: TogglePauseMenu Toggle the pause menu. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:TogglePauseMenu() -- Open or close the pause menu
docs.title: TogglePauseMenu

docs.text: Toggle the pause menu. Argument Data Type Nedeed Default Description active boolean - Example exports["utility_weapons"]:TogglePauseMenu() -- Open or close the pause menu
